title: Understanding the Psychology Behind Fear of the Dark Among Students
author: Conor Benson
description: Fear of the dark is a common experience that transcends age, yet it is particularly prevalent among students navigating the complex transitions of childhood and adolescence. While this fear may appear trivial to some, it holds significant psychological implications and can impact a student's well-being and academic performance.

title: The Alarm Clock Anxiety: Understanding the Fear of Waking Up Late Among Students
author: Conor Benson
description: As the sun rises, millions of students across the globe awaken to the harsh beeping of their alarm clocks. However, for some, this experience is not just a morning ritualâ€”it transforms into a deep-seated anxiety known as the fear of waking up late.

title: Chapter Spotlight: How UofT EWB is Engineering Change in Toronto
author: Conor Benson
description: With a new school year just around the corner, many of our 20+ EWB academic chapters across Canada have started their recruitment processes. Located at the heart of Ontario, our University of Toronto chapter is busy with recruitment, setting up projects, and preparing for xChange 2024!
